author: CBC News
title: Along Ukraine's border with Russia, some young people fear losing their newfound identity | CBC News
description: Many young people in Ukraine grew up near borders with Russia and spoke the language. But they have turned their backs on that identity in favour of a more Western one. They fear a war will pull them back.
content:
There was little talk of the crisis currently holding Ukraine in its grip as people lined up at a small kiosk selling coffee and cigarettes on a Kyiv street Tuesday morning.
